features.text: An ambitious, detail-oriented and goal-driven Software Developer based in Toronto, Canada. I believe time management and organizational skills are key in tackling down tasks.
Over the past few years, I have had the honor to work with fantastic organizations. Independantly, and within teams, I've been able to build products used by thousands - if not millions - of people.
Almost everything is constantly changing and, therefore, I believe in the significance of always expanding my knowledge and skillset in order to adapt with the rapid change.
